citations.narrative:
A written program of veterinary care for dogs has not been completed. A written program of veterinary care for dogs is
required to ensure veterinary care follows veterinarian guidance to assure optimal animal welfare. Licensee must follow
an appropriate program of veterinary care for dogs that is developed, documented in writing, and signed by the attending
veterinarian. Correct by: November 14, 2022
This inspection was a site approval inspection.
This site is not ready for approval to conduct activity covered under your current Animal Welfare Act License.
Conducting regulated activities at a non-approved site is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Please contact your inspector to schedule your next new site approval inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.13(a) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
A written program of veterinary care for dogs has not been completed.  A written program of veterinary care for dogs is 
required to ensure veterinary care follows veterinarian guidance to assure optimal animal welfare.  Licensee must follow 
an appropriate program of veterinary care for dogs that is developed, documented in writing, and signed by the attending 
veterinarian.  Correct by:  November 14, 2022 
 
This inspection was a site approval inspection. 
This site is not ready for approval to conduct activity covered under your current Animal Welfare Act License. 
Conducting regulated activities at a non-approved site is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Please contact your inspector to schedule your next new site approval inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
